statements: DELETE FROM user_interaction_data WHERE user_id = 1 AND interaction_type = 'like' AND interaction_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-02-01');
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND interaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM learning_progress WHERE module_completed = 3 AND user_id = 2;
DELETE FROM user_progress WHERE course_id = '72c9f3e4-8cb2-4ac8-b9c6-17f484d41956' AND lesson_id = '496ff11e-7820-489b-8a11-ccf23efc7b3f';
DELETE FROM user_courses WHERE user_id = 100 AND course_id = 5;
DELETE FROM course_materials WHERE material_id = 10 AND course_id = 3 AND material_type = 'Video';
DELETE FROM User WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND age = 30;
